text: Trdat the Architect (c. 950-1020) (Armenian: Տրդատ ճարտարապետ), known in Latin as Tiridates, was chief architect of the Bagratuni Dynasty of Armenia. After a great earthquake in 989 destroyed the dome of Hagia Sophia, the Byzantine officials sent Trdat to Byzantium to organize repairs. The restored dome was completed by 994. ==Other websites== * The Ani cathedral * Cities and sites in Armenia Category:Byzantine Empire Category:950s births Category:1020 deaths
title: Trdat the Architect
